By studying and participating extensively in social activities on the campus. Adamu appeared to be biting more than he can chew. This means Adamu was

Choose from the options lettered A - E the one that is most nearly opposite in meaning to the underlined word

John is a very industrious man though people think he is____________
explanation:
Industrious means to be diligent and hard-working.

Idle is the most nearly opposite in meaning to industrious. It means (of a person) avoiding work; lazy.

Choose from the options lettered A-E the one that meet appropriately completes each sentence

Sekinatu is the .......... of the two sisters
explanation:
When comparing two  people, wiser is grammatically correct to be used.
Example; He is wiser than you. (between two persons)

when the statement is describing one person, wisest can be used. example;
Where shall we find the wisest man?

Choose from the options lettered A - E the one that has a different stress pattern from the other four.


A. administration
B. participation
C. temperamental
D. consideration
E. civilization
explanation: Temperamental has a different stress pattern from the rest of the words. It is stressed on the third syllable, while the rest are stressed on the fourth syllable.
